title: High ping after 7-9pm WAST for last 3 days
body: Exactly what it says. TPG 100/30 MBit. ping range 200-500. Only occurs after 7-9pm (works fine before 7pm) Last 3 days.

replies.body: Cheeres man. The issue fixed itself. The ISP swore it wasn't their problem, I have a 100/30 MBit connection, (not wireless) and would still get my normal pings on other games, speedtests, dl speeds  etc. That's why I deduced it was your end, but as I said, the problem fixed itself.

Hey there,

Sounds to me like you're experiencing issues due to peak usage in your area around the time period you've specified.

You'll have to contact your ISP regarding this.
